title: Skud
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, Hugh Burton and Donna Swan
brief_description: Tasha comes from a dysfunctional family; alcoholic mother, abusive father and absent sister. She finds release in boxing and becomes friends with Matt whom she meets at a youth referral centre. Matt has his own problems, spending his time graffiting his tag, ‘Skud’, around railway stations and aspiring to train surfing. Matt drags Tasha into his world, compounding her problems and reaching a tragic conclusion. Starring Heather Bradley, Samuel Johnson, Lynda Gibson and Jules Hutchison.
